TextView.android:text: Look up the word for greatness in the lexicon and the Tathva Quiz will be your most appropriate match. The Tathva Quiz is the battleground of the country\'s brightest quizzing minds as they fight it out in three categories that test their mettle in this field. Quizzers and eminent quizmasters descend in hordes from every nook and cranny of the country to claim eternal glory and laurels for their institutions. Ever since its inception, the Tathva Quiz has never ceased to impress the onlookers in terms of the sheer energy and mood of the quizzing arena.\n\nPlay your cards well and remember Everyone is a genius at least once a year.

Do you think you've what it takes to battle it out to be the ultimate technocrat? Then Prahelika is the place for you. Come, test technical trivia with the best budding minds to conquer the most treasured prize in technical quizzing. With participation from teams all over South India, Prahelika is where you'll see the finest college teams showcasing their technical knowledge. Not to forget the prizes amounting to 10K.

Specifications:
1. It is a college level event.
2. A team can consist of maximum 2 members.
3. Any number of teams from an institution is allowed.
4. Cross college teams are also allowed.
5. Registration for the event will be separate i.e. participants need not register for Tathva.
6. Participants must produce a valid college ID card during registration.
7. Those who have registered for Tathva need not register for the event separately.

Catch Artha, the best of business quizzing in Kerala. Artha is where the best in the circuit show what it takes to be the best. Definitely a quiz not to be missed if an entertaining trip down the line of business know-how is what gives you a kick. With a prize tag of 15K, it takes more than being just a quizzer to conquer this one.

Specifications:
1. It is an open event.
2. A team can consist of maximum 2 members.
3. Any number of teams from an institution is allowed.
4. Registration for the event will be separate i.e. participants need not register for Tathva.
5. Participants must produce a valid ID card during registration.
6. Those who have registered for Tathva need not register for the event separately.

FARTHA: THE BIZ QUIZ

And yet again, it's that time of the year, when the holy grail of business quizzing in Kerala is just around the corner. Artha : Where the great, like-minded business enthusiasts from around the state converge for an all out business based battle royale. With an enticing prize money, this is definitely one not to be missed, if the world of business is your cup of tea. Be there.

Specifications:
1. It is a college event.
2. A team can consist of maximum 3 members.
3. Any number of teams from an institution is allowed.
4. Registration for the event will be separate i.e. participants need not register for
Tathva.
5. Participants must produce a valid ID card during registration.
6. Those who have registered for Tathva need not register for the event separately.
7. The registration fee is Rs.50 per head, if not registered for Tathva.

PRAHELIKA: THE TECH QUIZ

A college quiz where teams will be grilled on their knowledge of the various facets of technology. One of the most highly anticipated tech-quizzes in Kerala, Prahelika has been a crowd pulling event at Tathva.Tech geeks from all over South India turn up for this annual event to prove they are the best in the field and yes also for the attractive prize money!!

Specifications:
1. It is a college event.
2. A team can consist of maximum 2 members. Inter collegiate teams are permitted.
3. Any number of teams from an institution is allowed.
4. Registration for the event will be separate i.e. participants need not register for
Tathva.
5. Participants must produce a valid college ID card during registration.
6. Those who have registered for Tathva need not register for the event separately.
7. The registration fee is Rs.50 per head per quiz, if not registered for Tathva.
8. This quiz will be conducted by Enquire,NITC Quiz club.

SAMASYA : THE SCHOOL QUIZ

Tathva presents Samasya, the school quiz. Get your grey cells into action as questions and answers fly out one after the other. Watch as the next generation quizzers blow your mind away. With huge participation and spectacular prizes, this is undoubtedly the biggest school quiz in Kerala.

The first round will consist of a written prelims which will be held in 15 centres all over Kerala. The top 32 teams from the prelims will battle out in NIT Calicut during Tathva. They will be further reduced to 6 teams who will participate in a grand finale hosted by senior Enquire(NITC Quiz club) member. Tathva has been the stage for exceptional quizzing in the past and will continue to do so. 

The stage is set, the hearts are pumping and the mind is racing. Gear yourself for a ride that you will never forget. NITC awaits the bright minds of Kerala. Don't miss this...!!!

Rules for SAMASYA:
1. Team of two members can register at their nearest venue by 10.00 am on 13th
October, 2012.
2. The registration fee per team will be Rs. 50
3. Any number of teams may participate from a school.
4. Open for students of classes IX to XII.
5. 32 teams will be shortlisted for the finals from all over the state.
6. One team from each centre will be selected for the finals, if they clear the minimum
cut off. Else, teams will be selected based on their scores.
7. Registration will be on the spot and participants will be required to produce their
school ID.

The prelims will be conducted at 15 centres across the state on October 13th. The venues are :
1. Christnagar Higher Secondary School, Kowdiar, Thiruvananthapuram
2. Trinity Lyceum School, Fathima Road, Altharamoodu Jn.,Kollam
3. SDV English Medium HSS, Sanathanam ward, Alappuzha
4. College of Engineering, Adoor, Pathanamthitta
5. Baselius College, Kottayam
6. Jai Rani Public School, Thodupuzha, Idukki
7. Sobhana English Medium HSS, Kothamangalam, Eranakulam
8. Bhavan’s Varuna Vidyalaya, Thrikkakkara, Kochi
9. Jawahar Balabhavan, Chembukav, Thrissur
10. Venkateshwara College, near Head Post Office, Koppam , Palakkad
11. Government Boy’s HSS, Manjeri , Malappuram
12. Edumart, near Moffusil Bus Stand (Puthiya Stand), Calicut
13. National Institute of Technology, Chathamangalam, Calicut
14. Chinmaya Vidyalaya, near IMA Hall, Talap , Kannur
15. ACKNS Govt. UP School Melangot, Kanhangad, Kasaragod


INSTRUCTIONS FOR PARTICIPANTS:
1. The written prelims of the quiz consist of 100 questions. These are to be answered in
90 minutes.
2. Each question carries 1 mark. There are negatives for 2 rounds, which will be
mentioned in the points scheme.
3. Write the answer for each question against the blank provided.
4. For multiple choice questions, tick the correct answer.
5. For each different type of questions, specific instructions will be provided with an
example.
6. Use blue/black ink pen to answer the questions.
7. In case of any doubts, contact the invigilators.
